title: Wasted on LoL
body:
Always fun to check this from time to time.....
http://wasted-on-lol.com/

185th out of ~150k ranked accounts. 
Diamond in play time, bronze in skill. FML.




http://s22.postimg.org/muti7fsqp/well_fuck.png
(and I still suck lol)

replies.body:
It's broken.

You've spent about 6896 hours on League of Legends which means 287 days of your life.
You're 0th on oce servers and 4.678th in the world. 

I'm 0th :) - actually based on current numbers - I'd be 71st but I'm not listed

You've spent about 1810 hours on League of Legends which means 75 days of your life.
You're 21.421th on oce servers and 1.051.795th in the world.

Yay me

75 days.
1800 hours. 
236 working days.
47 working weeks.

I'd imagine it goes by how many games you've played and puts them all down as an average game length and finds out that way. Other people have suggested that it goes by how much IP you have and how much IP you've spent.
When it says "you've spent #### on LoL." is that in client and game or just game?
Dunno how they work it out
I have 5 years on this game, that site tells me 39 days only, a little bit wrong there I think. There is no way I could only have 39 days total.

http://prntscr.com/9x2mgt

I have a few hundred hours on various other accounts as well.
I had the same on NA but I could not find any record of it :(
